subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Twins’ elite catcher Joe Mauer has been an integral part of the team’s resurgence in the A.L. Central, but questions about whether he will stay in Minnesota are circling.
snippet: The Twins’ elite catcher Joe Mauer has been an integral part of the team’s resurgence in the A.L. Central, but questions about whether he will stay in Minnesota are circling.
